actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require medicaid plans to disregard regular annual increases in veterans' benefits if the increase would have the effect of disqualifying individuals already eligible for medicaid benefits.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require State Medicaid plans to disregard regular annual increases in veterans' benefits when such increases disqualify individuals who are already eligible for Medicaid benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require medicaid plans to disregard regular annual increases in veterans' benefits if the increase would have the effect of disqualifying individuals already eligible for medicaid benefits.
